com.github.dm.jrt.android.core.invocation

Interface ContextInvocation<IN,OUT>

  • Type Parameters:
    IN - the input data type.
    OUT - the output data type.
    All Superinterfaces:
    Invocation<IN,OUT>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractContextInvocation, CallContextInvocation, ChannelContextInvocation, ContextInvocationDecorator, ContextInvocationWrapper, IdentityContextInvocation, RoutineContextInvocation, TemplateContextInvocation

    public interface ContextInvocation<IN,OUT>
extends Invocation<IN,OUT>
    Interface defining an invocation aware of the specific Android Context.

    The class TemplateContextInvocation provides an abstract empty implementation of the Context invocation interface.

    Created by davide-maestroni on 01/08/2015.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      void onContext(Context context)
      Called right after the instantiation to specify the invocation Context.

      • onContext

               Context context)
        throws Exception
        Called right after the instantiation to specify the invocation Context.
        Parameters:
        context - the Context of the invocation.
        Throws:
        Exception - if an unexpected error occurs.
